==Description==
Legend has it that Mondstadt once played host to one who made music on bowstrings&mdash;<br />
Or perhaps it might be more fitting to say that this wandering musician used an instrument's strings to fire arrows.<br />
But this is naught but an old folk legend.

==Trivia==
*[[Amber]] is seen wielding this bow in her wish art.
*[[Diona]] is seen wielding this bow in her [[Genius Invokation TCG]] [[Diona (Character Card)|Character Card]].
*The legend of the "wandering musician" mentioned in the bow's lore likely refers to the [[Sojourner]]. He lived in [[Mondstadt]] 1000 years ago and wielded [[The Stringless]], a bow that doubled as a harp.
